summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the assessments levied for the improvement of 44th Avenue Southwest and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by concrete walk, Local Improvement District No. 3429, on block 4, Wabash Addition; and on lots 1, 2 and 4, block 4, Spring Hill Garden Tracts; also reducing the assessments on lots 5 and 5, block 4, Spring Hill Garden Tracts.
